channel.title: Join Near-Hell we're back online chance to have staff
channel.description:
Website: [url=http://near-hell.com]http://near-hell.com[/url] Download: [url=http://near-hell.com/downloads.php]http://near-hell.com/downloads.php[/url] Webclient [url=http://near-hell.com/game.php]http://near-hell.com/game.php[/url]
Features:l
Friendly Staff and Owner's Staff Positions Available Full Screen and resizeable GWD Friendly staff!! Kbd!! Donaterzone!! no lag!! Corp!! Duel Arena!! Barrows!! fight pits!! Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends Great Economy All Skill Working!!!! All GodWars bosses!
No lag or memory leaks. No dupes.
Our community
Near-Hell has a very nice and friendly community that is always there to help you out. We strive fordirect player reflection; this means that players should be the ones to help other players out. This ensures the best gaming environment possible. Check it out by visiting our forums:http://near-hell.com/forum
